Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: A mix of opinions sarcastic quips and serious concerns fill the social media airwaves as the Australian federal budget looms. From criticizing policy proposals to implicit accusations of hidden agendas behind statements the people have expressed a range of responses. Some express skepticism over Bitcoin's utility while others highlight concerns about income inequality and unnecessary privileges to the wealthy. Amidst it all a lighthearted video interview with Bob Katter adds a touch of humor while a podcast episode explores topics on the economy and cabinet reshuffle.
